alert.note: Alert for Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 1:20PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mobile County through 215 PM CDT... At 120 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Theodore, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Theodore, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre and Coden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
